chromaspeclib.internal.payload.ChromaSpecPayloadClassFactory(protocol, command_id, name, variables, sizes, repeat=None)¶
class chromaspeclib.internal.payload.ChromaSpecRepeatPayload¶

Bases: chromaspeclib.internal.payload.ChromaSpecPayload

The difference from the parent class is that the repeat process requires packing arrays, and requires partially-gradually unpacking the payload, since part of the payload defines how much to continue to pack and unpack.
